name: [] (array access)
brief: The array access operator is used to specify a location within an array
description: The array access operator is used to specify a location within an array. The data at this location can be defined with the syntax array[element] = value and read with the syntax value = array[element] as shown in the above example.

parameters.name: datatype
parameters.description: any primitive or compound datatype, including user-defined classes

parameters.name: element
parameters.description: int: must not exceed the length of the array minus 1
